myself.title: Designer & Developer
myself.subtitle: I’m the developer that makes you <strike>hesitate</strike>. The designer that makes you <strike>wonder</strike>. Welcome to my site. I’m Ramon. It’s nice to have you here.

myself.title: Lights

myself.title: Personal Branding

text.title: The story
text.description: Originally from a small town in rural Catalonia and after +1.5 years in Norway working as an iOS developer & Concept Designer, while graduating from Electronic Engineering, I’m up to new challenges and new stories.

text.title: The manifesto
text.description: When I get asked to describe the work I do, I keep on thinking. I do what makes you think. The prototype that makes you win. The design that makes you wow. Welcome to my site. I’m Ramon. It’s nice to have you here.

text.title: The awards
text.description: Working together requires trust. Being selected among 300 developers to attend the 2015 Apple's WWDC, A top 3 student award in Electronic Engineering and the recognition as the best thesis in University guarantees that trust.

lights.title: Lights
lights.project: Merging Electronics with a beautifully designed product to create an easy to use solution to control an elegant 3D designed lamp_ Two servers, one iOS application or one microcontroller for the light are some of the components that were born and developed by me.

quote?.text: My biggest side project up to date. I was asked to think creatively. So I went nuts. After 7 months working every afternoon after work. I delivered this award winner thesis.

friends.title: Cubus Friends
friends.project: Work done at and with Hyper (Oslo) for one of the biggest retail stores in Norway. Concept and iOS app done for the costumers of the brand, in order for them to get more involved in the day to day of the big company.

images.description: Member Card detail of Cubus Friends
images.title: Member Card

images.description: Bonus Checks and coupons of the app
images.title: Bonus Checks

branding.title: Branding
branding.project: My most personal project up to date. Working against the clock to perform the design, photography, concept, development and testing to release one of the projects that has guided me to my style like no other.

quote?.text: After nights working, sketches, prints papers scratched and lots of hours of watching old TVs and failing printers I found the style that now defines me. It’s been a long process, but I’m super satisfied with the result of it.
